name: brecken basket
notes:
the brecken basket is a midsized basket with 2 side handles, that can be used to hold so many things! 

use it to store yarn or even as a pant pot cover! this is a beginner friendly pattern that uses basic crochet stitches. the instructions show you how to use 3 colors to create a striped design, but feel free to use as many or few colors as you’d like. 

this basket uses 2 strands of bulky weight yarn held together to make a sturdy basket that won’t flop over. if you are unable to find a bulky weight yarn, you can substitute for 1 strand of super bulky (6) weight yarn. note that the size and sturdiness may differ if a different yarn is used.

difficulty: easy

standard us crochet terms

finished size: approx. 10" x 10"

supplies: 2 strands of bulky (5) weight yarn held together, 8.00mm (l) hook, yarn needle, & scissors.
for yarn i used lion brand yarn hue + me (196 yards of white, 78 yards black, 116 yards orange)

patten also includes:
-gauge pattern
-link to free video tutorial
-special stitches instructions & photos
-detailed written instructions for a 3 color basket.
